name.ja: エクシーズ・エントラスト

text.en: Add 1 "Armored Xyz" card from your Deck or GY to your hand, then you can make the Levels of up to 2 face-up monsters you control become 3 or 5 until the end of this turn. If this card is in your GY, except the turn it was sent there: You can banish this card, then target 1 Xyz Monster Card treated as an Equip Card in your Spell & Trap Zone; Special Summon it. You can only activate 1 "Xyz Entrust" per turn.
